janadhipathiwarana wedikawe winaya ha yaha palanaya gana katha karana sarath fonseka mahatha 1976 di yuda hamudawe nithya niladhariyaku washayen hamuda winaya ha yaha pawathma agathiyata path kirime charyawa sambandhayen chodana laba thibe.me chodanawa yuda hamudawa magin ohuta idiripath kara aththe 1975 desambar 25 wana dina diyathalawa hamuda puhunu madhyasthanaye nila niwasedi niladhariyakuge ha mahathma gathi athi pudgalayakuge charyawata nogalapena ayurin katayuthu kirima nisa ya.me sambandhayen yuda hamuda panathe 129 (1) waganthiya yatathe fonseka mahathata danduwam pamunuwa atha.
